About THE MADRAS GRAND

Close to Marina Beach, this lavish property makes for a relaxing stay option with its stylish rooms, a dining venue, a health centre and upscale amenities.

  • Start your day with a revitalising workout session at the on-site health centre.
  • Enjoy the property's close proximity to Marina Beach which is 4.5 km away.
  • Delight your senses with the aromas of palatable dishes at the in-house restaurant.

THE MADRAS GRAND

Close to Marina Beach, this lavish property makes for a relaxing stay option with its stylish rooms, a dining venue, a health centre and upscale amenities.

Food and Dining

The property features an elegant restaurant that serves mouth-watering local and Indian delicacies.Travellers gave a thumbs-up to the property for the good food served here.

Location & Surroundings

This opulent property is situated on Chinna Street, Egmore in Chennai. It is just a short drive away from Chennai International Airport.Moreover, it is close to popular tourist sites such as Marina Beach and Semmozhi Poonga.

Property Highlights

  • The property features a lavish restaurant to tantalise your taste buds.
  • There is a well-equipped health centre where you can enjoy intense workout sessions.
  • The property offers a state-of-the-art banquet hall where you can host impressive events.
  • There is high-speed Wi-Fi available for your convenience.
  • The property has a parking area so that you can park your personal vehicle without any hassle.

Room Details and Amenities

  • The property features well-appointed and delicately designed accommodation options and they can be classified as Premium Double Rooms, Premium Twin Rooms, The MG Suites and The Premium Rooms Quad.
  • The Premium Double Room measures 300 sq. ft in size and features a plush king bed. Moreover, it offers stunning views of the city.
  • The Premium Twin Room is spread across an area of 300 sq. ft and features twin beds and a work desk. Moreover, it offers magnificent views of the city.
  • The MG Suite covers an area of 350 sq. ft and offers a sumptuous king bed and incredible views of the city.
  • The Premium Room Quad features an opulent king bed or twin beds, an air purifier and a work desk. Moreover, it offers splendid views of the city.
  • Each accommodation unit is equipped with modern amenities such as high-speed Wi-Fi, in-room dining, a smoke alarm, an electric kettle, an iron/ironing board, a safe locker, a minibar, a hairdryer, laundry service, daily housekeeping and 24-hour room service.

Activities & Nearby Attractions

  • Witness the beauty of Marina Beach which is 4.5 km away from the property.
  • Spend time at Semmozhi Poonga which is 5.8 km away from the property.
  • Visit the revered Sri Kaalikambal Temple which is 6.4 km away from the property.

How to Reach the Property

  • Chennai International Airport is 20.6 km away from the property.
  • Puratchi Thalaivar Dr. M.G. Ramachandran Central Railway Station is 2.9 km away from the property.
  • Egmore Bus Stop is 2.1 km away from the property.

    Clean rooms with modern amenities.

    Rated 4.0 by Mohammed Shoaib M . Family Traveller . Sep 24, 2022

    Its a relatively new property with 3-star hotel type amenities, located conveniently in the city centre. The hotel is usually booked full, because it is budget friendly, and has clean and well equipped rooms with all the necessary amenities. Only drawback is its restuarant, which is very small (has just 4-5 tables) and buffet breakfast has very limited options and also you have to keeping asking the waiters to fill up the buffet food frequently. You can have a better breakfast outside.
